subtitle.subtitle: From the Treaty of the Treason
In penance for their uprising each district shall offer up
a male and female between the ages of and at a public reaping
These Tributes shall be delivered to the custody of the Capitol
And then transferred to a public arena where theyll Fight to the Death until a lone victor remains
Henceforth and forevermore this pageant shall be known as The Hunger Games
It comes out of a particularly painful part of our history
But its been the way weve been able to heal
At first it was a reminder of the rebellion
It was a price the districts had to pay
But I think it has grown from that
I think its something that knits us all together
This is your third year as Gamemaker
Your names only been in there once
What are you gonna do with that when you kill it
What are you gonna do with a
The place is crawling with Peacekeepers
I was gonna sell it to some Peacekeepers
Like you dont sell to Peacekeepers
It was the first deer Ive seen in a year
What if everyone just stopped watching
You cry when they get killed
If no one watches then they dont have a game
We could do it you know
Take off live in the woods
Cut out our tongues or worse
We wouldnt make it five miles
I have Prim and you have your brothers
I might if I didnt live here
I know but if I didnt
And may the odds be ever in your favor
How many times is your name in today
Guess the odds arent exactly in my favor
But you better tuck in that tail little duck
I laid something out for you too
l wish I looked like you little duck
You want to see what I got you today
And as long as you have it nothing bad will happen to you
Its time to sign in now
Theyre gonna prick your finger just to take a little bit of blood
Go sit down there with the little kids
And may the odds be ever in your favor
Now before we begin we have a very special film
Brought to you all the way from The Capitol
This was the uprising that rocked our land
Thirteen districts rebelled against the country that fed them
Brother turned on brother until nothing remained
And then came the peace hard fought sorely won
A people rose up from the ashes and a new era was born
We swore as a nation we would never know this treason again
And so it was decreed that each year the various districts of Panem
would offer up in tribute one young man and woman
to fight to the death in a pageant of honor courage and sacrifice
The lone victor bathed in riches would serve as a reminder
of our generosity and our forgiveness
This is how we remember our past
This is how we safeguard our future
Now the time has come for us to select
one courageous young man and woman
for the honor of representing District in the th Annual Hunger Games
I believe we have a volunteer Mr
Prim you need to get out of here
You need to get out of here
Prim go find Mom right now
A dramatic turn of events here in District
Well I bet my hat that was your sister wasnt it

Well go on you two shake hands
And may the odds be ever in your favor
Prim I dont have much time
Dont take any extra food from them
It isnt worth putting your name in more times
You can sell cheese from your goat
No matter what you feel you have to be there for her
They will if you show them how good you are
They just want a good show
If they dont have a bow then you make one okay
Whatever you do dont let them starve
You two are in for a treat
Crystal chandeliers platinum doorknobs and it flies
Well be at The Capitol in less than two days
Now before you do anything else
miles per hour and you can barely feel a thing
I think its one of the wonderful things about this opportunity
that even though youre here and even though its just for a little while
you get to enjoy all of this
Hes probably in the bar car
You know Katniss he is our mentor
He did win this thing once
Look you know if you dont want to talk I understand
but I just dont think theres anything wrong with getting a little bit of help
Most of you arent in such a hurry
I wanna know what the plan is
Youre supposed to tell us how to get sponsors and give us advice
Embrace the probability of your imminent death
And know in your heart that theres nothing I can do to save you
So why are you here then
Okay I think thats enough of that
You made me spill my drink
You know I think Ill go finish this in my room
Im gonna go talk to him
They always provide pretty good opponents
And one of my favorite Arenas
The use of the rubble in the ruined city
this moment is a moment that you never forget
The moment when a Tribute becomes a victor
No because Id light a fire
Thats a good way to get killed
Whats a good way to get killed
I was just giving some life
I was just asking about how to find shelter
Which would come in handy if in fact you were still alive
Give me a chance to wake up sweetheart
This mentoring is very taxing stuff
You really want to know how to stay alive
You get people to like you
Well when youre in the middle of The Games and youre starving or freezing
some water a knife or even some matches
can mean the difference between life and death
And those things only come from sponsors
And to get sponsors you have to make people like you
And right now sweetheart youre not off to a real good start
So now that youve seen them
what do you think about this years crop of recruits
Are there any surprises that we can expect this year
Its really hard to tell just from a Reaping
But I think this is a very interesting mix
And whenever you have a volunteer from an outlying district
Were just saying we might need to hose you down again
before we take you to Cinna
That was one of the bravest things Ive ever seen
Im sorry that this happened to you
and Im here to help you in any way that I can
Well I dont see the point in that
So tonight they have the Tribute Parade
Im gonna take you out and show you off to the world
So youre here to make me look pretty
Im here to help you make an impression
Now usually they dress people in the clothes from their district
Yeah but I dont wanna do that
I wanna do something that theyre gonna remember
Did they explain about trying to get sponsors
Yeah but Im not very good at making friends
I just think somebody that brave
shouldnt be dressed up in some stupid costume now should they
These suits are built so you wont feel a thing
Over people craning to get a glimpse of this years Tributes
And the sponsors get to see the Tributes for the first time

It just gives you goose bumps

they so clearly are able to reflect the character of each district
And behind them we have two power plant workers

Two young people holding their hands up saying
Im proud I come from District
People are sure gonna be paying attention to them right now
We salute your courage and your sacrifice
And may the odds be ever in your favor
We are all anybodys going to be talking about
Are you sure you should be near an open flame
So each of the districts get their own floor
And because youre from you get the penthouse
So this is the living room
Now your rooms are right over here
Why dont you go clean yourselves up a little before dinner
In two weeks of you will be dead
One of you will be alive
Who that is depends on how well you pay attention over the next four days
particularly to what Im about to say
First no fighting with the other Tributes
Youll have plenty of time for that in the Arena
The rest will be individual training
My advice is dont ignore the survival skills
Everybody wants to grab a sword
but most of you will die from natural causes
Exposure can kill as easily as a knife
I put my knife right there
You took my knife you liar
Ill finish you right now kid
Actually better yet Ill wait for the Arena
Youre the first one I get so watch your back
You know who youre messing with kid
They train in a special academy until theyre
By that point theyre pretty lethal
But they dont receive any special treatment
In fact they stay in the exact same apartment as you do
And I dont think they let them have dessert
They win it almost every year but
And arrogance can be a big problem
No shes better than all right

pound sack of flour right over his head
Okay well Im not gonna kill anybody with a sack of flour

if somebody comes after you with a knife
I have no chance of winning

She said District might finally have a winner
But she wasnt talking about me

I dont care what Haymitch said

why not round up of them at random and execute them all at once

so you and I will be going down at

Just be yourself Ill be there the whole time
And just pretend that youre talking to me

Im wearing one of our own creations
Its an honor representing my district
I find that if I can apply myself to the situation present
I will be able to figure it out

Well we know her as the lovely Katniss Everdeen

at the Tribute Parade the other day
Do you want to tell us about it
Well I was just hoping that I wouldnt burn to death
When you came out of that chariot
I have to say my heart stopped
Did any of you experience this as well

In fact Im wearing them today
I have one more question for you
We were all very moved I think when you volunteered for her at the Reaping
Did she come and say goodbye to you
And what did you say to her in the end
I told her that I would try to win
That I would try to win for her
Katniss Everdeen The Girl on Fire
How are you finding The Capitol
And dont say With a map
Its very different than back home
Well the showers here are weird
I have a question for you Caesar
Do I smell like roses to you
You definitely smell better than I do
is there a special girl back home
I dont believe it for a second
There is this one girl that Ive had a crush on forever
But I dont think she actually recognized me until the Reaping
Well Ill tell you what Peeta
You go out there and you win this thing
and when you get home shell have to go out with you

Because she came here with me
And I wish you all the best of luck

He made you look desirable which in your case cant hurt sweetheart
Now I can sell the star

which could save your damn life
Why dont you get out of here
Maybe I can deliver you both in one piece tomorrow
Im sorry I went after you
You know I meant that as a compliment
I just dont want them to change me
Theyd turn me into something Im not
I just dont want to be another piece in their game you know
You mean you wont kill anyone
I mean Im sure I would just like anybody else
but I just keep wishing that I could think of a way to show them

I just cant afford to think like that
I guess Ill see you tomorrow

allowing for two victors from the same district

that the thought of not being with him was unthinkable
Youd rather die than not be with him

I felt like the happiest person in the world

this years victors of the th Annual Hunger Games
